input: Initiate a batch request to query lock requests, update a contract's user status, and add a new note.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequests?$select=ID,EventName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCardContractLockRequests/232323 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode": "5", "Note": "Updated after review."}


--request-separator--
